translation.en: [narrator] Hollywood, California. Tinseltown is boomtown.
During the war, Los Angeles grew as a hub of wartime industry,
translation.de: Während des Krieges wurde LA zum Zentrum der Kriegsindustrie.

translation.en: producing all manner of aircraft and ammunition
to support our fighting men overseas.
translation.de: zur Unterstützung unserer Männer in Übersee.

translation.en: The war now over,
many of these starry-eyed dreamers hope to make it in moving pictures,
translation.de: Viele dieser Träumer hoffen auf Erfolg in der Filmbranche.

translation.en: swarming like so many locusts outside the studio gates,
translation.de: Sie versammeln sich wie Heuschrecken vor den Studiotoren,

translation.en: hoping to score a role as an extra
and become the next Paul Muni or Hedy Lamarr.
translation.de: und darauf, das Erbe von Paul Muni oder Hedy Lamarr anzutreten.

translation.en: The studio system is king,
and if you make all the right moves, you too could be living in Beverly Hills,
translation.de: Mit den richtigen Schritten kannst auch du in Beverly Hills leben,

translation.en: splashing in your private pool with invitations to all the right parties.
translation.de: im eigenen Pool schwimmen und zu wichtigen Partys eingeladen werden.

translation.en: You might even become immortalized at Grauman's Chinese Theatre.
translation.de: Vielleicht wirst du sogar vor Grauman's Chinese Theater verewigt.

translation.en: The rewards for ambition are bountiful here
translation.de: Die Belohnungen für Ehrgeiz sind mannigfaltig

translation.en: in the beautiful Southern California sun.
[man] Pardon me. Beg your pardon.
Sorry, excuse me.
Excuse me, pardon me. Excuse me, coming through. Sorry.
translation.de: Verzeihung. Ich muss durch. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: -Hiya, Lou! -Hey, Jackie. Get over here, kid.
-Say, what time'd you get here? -About an hour ago,
-early birds getting worms and such. -Sure.
They're still lensing the John Farrow picture with Alan Ladd and Donna Reed.
translation.de: Sie drehen den John-Farrow-Film mit Alan Ladd und Donna Reed.

translation.en: -"Lensing"? -Lensing.
It's how you say "filmmaking" in Hollywood-ese. You gotta learn the lingo.
translation.de: So sagt man in Hollywood "filmen". Musst du lernen.

translation.en: Billy Wilder is helming a picture with Emperor Franz--
translation.de: Billy Wilder inszeniert was über Kaiser Franz...

translation.en: -"Helming"? -Directing.
Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, it's gonna be boffo BO.
translation.de: Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, das wird ein Kassenschlager.

translation.en: And she thinks we're gonna start the day on the big ballroom scene.
translation.de: Sie denkt, wir beginnen mit der Ballsaalszene.

translation.en: Lots of extras. People standing by the punch bowl,
translation.de: Viele Statisten. Leute, die an der Bowle stehen,

translation.en: folks crossing the hallway when they enter the big door.
translation.de: den Gang lang laufen, wenn sie reinkommen.

translation.en: I think I got a real shot at that one.
What about a western or war picture? Something like that. They making any of those?
translation.de: Und Western oder Kriegsfilme? Machen die so was in der Art?

translation.en: You don't say "making a movie," Jack. You produce a movie, "produce."
translation.de: "Filme machen" sagt man nicht. Man produziert Filme.

translation.en: You gotta know this stuff if you wanna make it big time.
translation.de: Lern die Dinge, wenn du Erfolg haben willst.

translation.en: Shh, shh, shh! Here she comes, the old gorgon herself.
translation.de: Hier kommt sie, der alte Drachen.

translation.en: Okay, listen up. I'm only gonna say this once.
translation.de: Ok, hören Sie zu. Ich sage das nur einmal.

translation.en: Rule number one, do not look at the camera.
translation.de: Regel Nummer eins: Nicht in die Kamera schauen.

translation.en: Rule number two, do not talk to the director.
translation.de: Zwei: Nicht mit dem Regisseur reden.

translation.en: In fact, a good rule of thumb is to not talk at all.
translation.de: Eine Faustregel ist, gar nicht zu reden.

translation.en: Rule number three, if you see a platter of food on the sound stage, do not eat it.
translation.de: Drei: Nicht die Lebensmittel im Studio essen.

translation.en: That is not for you. That is for the actors and the crew.
translation.de: Die sind nicht für Sie, sondern für Darsteller und Crew.

translation.en: If you see food on the set, do not eat that. That is a prop.
translation.de: Außerdem nichts am Set essen. Das sind Requisiten.

translation.en: Now we have that out of the way.
Today, we're lensing a scene from a war pic.
-Lensing. -[woman] Seven were saved where the plane goes down,
and a bunch of passengers flail around in the water and then die, okay?
translation.de: und einige Passagiere schwimmen im Wasser und sterben, ok?

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -All right, uh, you,
-and you... -[man] Thanks!
You, you and you...
you...
uh, you...
and...
-you. -[cymbal crashes]
[woman] Okay, thank you very much. That's it for today. See y'all tomorrow.
translation.de: Ok, vielen Dank. Das war's für heute. Bis morgen.

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Roswell. Beg your pardon, Jack Castello. I think I'd be great in your war picture.
translation.de: Verzeihung, Ms. Roswell. Jack Castello. Ich wäre gut geeignet für den Kriegsfilm.

translation.en: The drowning scene? You see, I fought at Anzio.
translation.de: Die Ertrinkenszene? Ich kämpfte in Anzio.

translation.en: -Oh, you have training? -Sure, Fort Benning, Georgia.
Mm, I mean acting training.
-You got any of that? -Well, no.
Good-looking kid like you, you think you just gotta show up and poof,
translation.de: Als attraktiver Kerl tauchen Sie auf und denken,

translation.en: you're a movie star, huh? Well, that ain't how it works.
translation.de: Sie werden im Nu Filmstar? So läuft das nicht.

translation.en: Pretty face, but no training. [chuckles] Kid, you're a dime a dozen.
translation.de: Hübsches Gesicht, aber unausgebildet. Sie gibt's doch im Dutzend.

translation.en: [man] Look, first breaks are tough in this town.
translation.de: Erste Chancen sind hier schwer zu kriegen.

translation.en: Don't beat yourself up.
No, no, no, no.
Already taken care of.
-What does he want? -Don't know. Maybe he thought you looked thirsty.
translation.de: -Was will er? -Weiß nicht. Siehst wohl durstig aus.

translation.en: [clerk] Now, you're looking for a loan of about $20,000?
translation.de: Sie wollen einen Kredit über 20.000 Dollar?

translation.en: [woman] Yes, that's right. Just enough for a modest home.
translation.de: Genau. Das reicht für ein bescheidenes Heim.

translation.en: [clerk] Swell, let's take a look at your application.
translation.de: Schön. Sehen wir uns den Antrag an.

translation.en: I see you're a veteran, Mr. Castello. Thank you for your service.
translation.de: Sie sind Veteran, Mr. Castello. Danke für Ihren Einsatz.

translation.en: And Mrs. Castello, you are a waitress.
translation.de: Und Mrs. Castello, Sie sind Kellnerin.

translation.en: Yes, and I intend to keep working until the baby arrives.
translation.de: Ja, und ich arbeite, bis das Baby da ist.

translation.en: [clerk] So, you're expecting?
Well, congratulations.
And Mr. Castello, it says here you're a film actor. Any pictures I might know you from?
translation.de: Und Mr. Castello, da steht, Sie sind Schauspieler. Kennt man Sie?

translation.en: Ah, probably not.
Uh, to me, it's not about the notoriety, it's about the craft.
translation.de: Für mich geht's nicht um Ruhm, sondern ums Handwerk.

translation.en: It's about showing up to work every day, you know.
translation.de: Darum, jeden Tag zur Arbeit zu gehen.

translation.en: -And for a super, that can mean-- -I'm sorry, a what?
Oh, a supernumerary. A supernumerary.
-It means "extra." -It means "background actor."
That's the proper term.
In many ways, we contribute to the reality of the scene
translation.de: Wir tragen mehr zur Realität der Szene bei

translation.en: even more so than the principal actors.
But I don't see any income here.
Uh, no, presently not, but, uh...
But hey! I've got a casting tomorrow,
translation.de: Hey! Ich habe morgen ein Casting.

translation.en: and if they pick me, that's ten dollars in my pocket!
translation.de: Nehmen sie mich, landen 10 Dollar in meiner Tasche!

translation.en: Very well. Uh...
Unfortunately, Mr. and Mrs. Castello,
we would be unable to provide a loan of the size that you're seeking based on your current income.
translation.de: bieten wir keinen Kredit in der Höhe an, aufgrund Ihres derzeitigen Einkommens.

translation.en: Listen, thank you for your time, sir.
One of those days, huh?
Bartender, two more, please.
-Why are you buying me drinks? -To thank you for your service.
translation.de: -Wozu die Einladung? -Als Dank für Ihren Einsatz.

translation.en: You served, didn't you? Where'd you fight?
-Anzio. -Anzio! [chuckles]
Anzio was rough.
-Jack. -Nice to meet you.
I wanted to fight. Tried to enlist and everything, but they wouldn't take me.
translation.de: Ich wollte mich verpflichten. Man wollte mich nicht.

translation.en: -Said my cock was too big. -[coughing]
Yeah, surprised me too. I mean, it's big.
translation.de: Überraschte mich auch. Also, es stimmt schon.

translation.en: Twelve inches, soup to nuts, and not floppy either.
translation.de: Insgesamt 30 cm, und labberig ist er auch nicht.

translation.en: I get hard as a fucking rock.
Are you for real? What are you talking about?
translation.de: Im Ernst? Was reden Sie da?

translation.en: -I got a very big dick. -[Jack] No, I...
I heard you when you said that. I'm wondering why. Why are you...
translation.de: Schon klar. Warum sagen Sie das?

translation.en: coming up to a stranger in a bar, talking about how big your cock is?
translation.de: Warum erzählen Sie Fremden von Ihrem Riesenschwanz?

translation.en: -Because you asked me. -Did I? Does not sound like me.
Look, all I'm saying is I know a hard-luck fella when I sees one.
translation.de: Ich will sagen, ich erkenne Pechvögel sofort.

translation.en: I used to be right where you are.
I used to worry about my wife and kids... They're grown now.
translation.de: Besorgt um Frau und Kinder. Sie sind jetzt groß.

translation.en: She's dead, God bless her. Good woman.
translation.de: Sie ist tot, Gott segne sie. Gute Frau.

translation.en: But I've been where you are, wondering what my life was gonna mean.
translation.de: Ich war wie du und grübelte über den Sinn des Lebens.

translation.en: -What do you want? -I run a service station.
And business is booming! I could use a good-looking fella like yourself pumping gas.
translation.de: Und das Geschäft boomt! Ein attraktiver Tankwart wäre nützlich.

translation.en: Why do you need someone good-looking to pump gas?
My gas station specializes in good-looking attendants.
translation.de: Wir sind spezialisiert auf attraktive Angestellte.

translation.en: It's my corner of the market, it's why we do good business. This is Hollywood, kid!
translation.de: Das ist meine Nische, darum boomt es. Wir sind in Hollywood!

translation.en: It's what people want. It's why they left their cow towns where they grew up.
translation.de: Das wollen die Leute. Darum verließen sie ihr Heimatkaff!

translation.en: They don't want some fatso looking under their hood, just reeking of sweat, grease under their fingernails.
translation.de: Es soll ihnen kein verschwitzter Fettsack mit Drecksnägeln unter die Haube schauen.

translation.en: It's an intimate act, if you think about it,
translation.de: Es ist eigentlich ein intimer Akt.

translation.en: and, get this...
They'll tip big for it.
This is for you.
Thanks.
What I offer is a vision of a new America.
translation.de: Ich biete eine Vision eines neuen Amerikas.

translation.en: The America that you fought for.
translation.de: Das Amerika, für das du gekämpft hast.

translation.en: You're very kind, but no. Okay.
Citrus and Normandy, if you change your mind. Golden Tip Gas.
translation.de: Citrus Ecke Normandie, falls du's dir überlegst. Golden Tip Gas.

translation.en: It's not our anniversary, is it? They cut our electricity, Jack.
translation.de: -Es ist nicht unser Hochzeitstag, oder? -Man kappte uns den Strom, Jack.

translation.en: Well...
sure is romantic, baby, huh?
Don't bother. You already knocked me up.
translation.de: Lass das. Ich bin schon schwanger.

translation.en: Cold wieners are on the table for you.
translation.de: Es liegen kalte Wiener auf dem Tisch.

translation.en: [Ernie] That looks good.
Kid, I gotta tell you, you look fantastic.
translation.de: Kleiner, ganz ehrlich? Du siehst fantastisch aus.

translation.en: Handsome, young, brimming with optimism.
And, oh, by the way, you're clean, right? No venereal disease?
translation.de: Du bist doch clean? Keine Geschlechtskrankheiten?

translation.en: Okay, what is-- What do you mean? What are you talking about? Look, kid, this town is all about dreams, right?
translation.de: -Was soll das? Was meinen Sie? -Hier dreht sich alles um Träume, oder?

translation.en: You know that.
And some of my customers don't just come here for gas.
translation.de: Einige Kunden kommen nicht nur wegen des Benzins.

translation.en: They have, uh, fantasies and desires.
And for them, it ain't enough to watch a fantasy up on the big screen.
translation.de: Ihnen reicht es nicht, Fantasien im Kino zu sehen.

translation.en: They want it for themselves, and I provide that for them.
translation.de: Sie wollen sie erleben. Ich mache es möglich.

translation.en: In a way, I'm no different than Louis B. Mayer, you know what I mean?
translation.de: Ich bin quasi wie Louis B. Mayer, weißt du?

translation.en: No, Ernie, I have no idea what you mean. You see, some of them say a secret code word.
translation.de: -Nein, Ernie, keine Ahnung. -Einige sagen das geheime Codewort.

translation.en: You get in the car with them. Have a drink maybe, or sometimes...
translation.de: Du steigst in ihr Auto, ihr trinkt was, und manchmal...

translation.en: sometimes you have to service 'em.
You gotta... you gotta be kidding me. What? You don't like women?
translation.de: -Das... Das ist doch ein Witz? -Was? Magst du keine Frauen?

translation.en: Sure, I like women, that's why I married one.
translation.de: Na klar, und deshalb habe ich eine geheiratet.

translation.en: [Ernie] All right, so let me ask you...
translation.de: Ok, ich will dich was fragen.

translation.en: -You never cheated on her? -No.
Okay, I'm going to ask you again.
You never cheated on her?
[woman moaning] Oh, Jack.
No, uh... One time. One time, I was... I was on leave, I was drunk.
translation.de: Doch. Einmal. Im Fronturlaub. Ich war betrunken.

translation.en: Then you're good! First time's always the hardest, and you got that outta the way. You're gonna be great.
translation.de: Super! Das erste Mal ist am schwersten. Das hast du hinter dir. Du packst das.

translation.en: Oh, here's one right here.
Jack, today is your lucky day.
-[bell dings] -This one's special, take it from me.
translation.de: Die ist was Besonderes, glaub's mir.

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Ernie, I'm not doing this.
translation.de: Nein. Ehrlich, Ernie, ich mach das nicht.

translation.en: I came here to be in pictures, I'm gonna be a movie star.
translation.de: Ich kam her, um Filme zu machen. Ich werde Filmstar.

translation.en: This, this is not for me. I-- I appreciate...
translation.de: Das ist nichts für mich. Danke für...

translation.en: Look, you hired me to pump gas, I'll pump gas. This, forget it. So long.
translation.de: Sie heuerten mich als Tankwart an. Mehr nicht. Das hier nicht. Wiedersehen.

translation.en: [Ernie] All right, but you just missed out on 100 bucks.
translation.de: Ok, aber du verzichtest auf 100 Mäuse.

translation.en: My customers pay twice that,
and you and me, we split it, 50-50.
So, are you gonna take it?
Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
translation.de: Oder soll es ein anderer tun?

translation.en: Fuck me.
[Ernie] Attaboy!
You're gonna do great.
-Shut up. -[Ernie] Let me know how it goes.
translation.de: -Du schaffst das. -Seien Sie still. Sag, wie es läuft.

translation.en: Fill 'er up?
I wanna go to Dreamland.
Okay.
You'll do nicely.
Welcome.
Where are we going?
I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.de: Ich mietete ein Zimmer. Meine Tochter ist daheim.

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
That's the fun of it.
translation.de: Das macht doch den Spaß aus.

translation.en: So, how long have you been here?
translation.de: Wie lange bist du schon hier?

translation.en: Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles?
translation.de: Oh... Sie meinen, in Los Angeles?

translation.en: Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.de: Wenige Monate. Ich komme aus Missouri.

translation.en: Let me guess...
you came here to be a movie star.
translation.de: Du kamst her, um Filmstar zu werden.

translation.en: How did you know? Takes one to know one.
translation.de: -Woher wissen Sie das? -War bei mir auch so.

translation.en: I was in pictures. Silent films.
Good ones, too.
But then came the talkies.
I had one screen test, and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.de: Bei einer Probeaufnahme sagten sie, Tonfilme seien nichts für Ausländer.

translation.en: A little "Jewey" was the word they used.
I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.de: Ich sagte höflich, dass Juden diese Stadt errichtet haben und musste gehen.

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star.
translation.de: Keiner fand Jüdinnen können Filmstars sein.

translation.en: Nobody thought they were pretty.
So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
translation.de: Also ging ich in eine Bar, betrank mich,

translation.en: met a low-level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.de: traf einen kleinen Fisch der Branche, der befördert werden sollte.

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl.
translation.de: Er sagte, ich könne maximal Drehbuchassistentin werden.

translation.en: A goddamn script reader.
I said, "Fuck this town, I'm done."
translation.de: Ich sagte: "Scheiß auf LA. Das war's."

translation.en: He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.de: Er schwängerte mich, wir heirateten, ich strafe ihn ab.

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.de: Jetzt ist er der Star, nicht diese Jüdin hier.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
translation.de: Darf ich dich was fragen, Jack?

translation.en: Why do you want to be a movie star?
You want an honest answer?
Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.de: Wir vögeln sowieso gleich, also warum nicht?

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
translation.de: Meine Eltern, meine Lehrer... Ach, danke.

translation.en: All telling me I was lucky I was good-looking.
translation.de: Alle sagten, ich hätte Glück, gut auszusehen.

translation.en: And I knew what they meant,
that that was all I had going for me.
I just want to do something big, you know? Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world.
translation.de: Ich will etwas Großes tun. Zeigen, dass ich groß rauskommen kann.

translation.en: Do something that matters. [chuckling] So movies...
you think they matter?
You kidding?
I know they do.
When you're walking through your life, it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.de: Wenn man durchs Leben geht, gibt man sich dem Alltragstrott hin, oder?

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything.
But when I was a kid... I grew up on a farm in Missouri,
translation.de: Aber ich wuchs auf einer Farm in Missouri auf.

translation.en: so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
translation.de: Wir fuhren eine halbe Stunde ins Kino.

translation.en: And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
translation.de: Als ich auf die riesige Leinwand schaute,

translation.en: I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.de: wusste ich plötzlich, wie sich das Leben anfühlen sollte,

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
translation.de: was es hieß, am Leben zu sein.

translation.en: It was like there was something somewhere out there...
translation.de: Es war, als ob etwas irgendwo da draußen...

translation.en: waiting for me.
That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
translation.de: Das bedeutet, am Leben zu sein.

translation.en: I held my first hand at a movie theater, I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I...
translation.de: Ich hielt im Kino zum ersten Mal Händchen, dort war mein erster Kuss...

translation.en: I don't know.
What I do know is this:
every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.de: Komme ich aus dem Kino, geht's mir besser als zuvor.

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
translation.de: So habe ich das nie gesehen.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
Only if you come and sit by me.
translation.de: Nur, wenn du zu mir kommst.

translation.en: I'm paying for company.
Why are you here?
I mean, doing this with me. [chuckles]
You got a husband you don't like?
Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie ich da wieder rauskomme.

translation.en: I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.de: Ich bin daran gewöhnt, reich zu sein, umsorgt zu werden.

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.de: Aber er kann sich kaum noch überwinden, mich anzurühren.

translation.en: So what's a girl to do?
Bridge?
Parcheesi?
I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.de: Ich schlief mit dem Butler. Gar nicht gut.

translation.en: This is much easier.
Less complicated.
You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
translation.de: Sie kommen an diesen öffentlichen Ort...

translation.en: it's kinda like you're asking to be caught. Maybe I am.
translation.de: -Fast, als ob Sie erwischt werden wollen. -Kann sein.

translation.en: Maybe I want to make my husband jealous. Maybe I want him to know...
translation.de: Vielleicht soll mein Mann eifersüchtig werden und wissen...

translation.en: that someone else desires me.
And that I'm still alive...
with so much more to give.
You're married.
Yeah, I am.
Do you feel guilty?
I gotta provide.
Then provide.
Yeah.
Listen...
How exactly do we, uh, get started?
Well, first you take your shoes off.
translation.de: Zuerst ziehst du deine Schuhe aus.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Got it.
My...
aren't I a lucky gal?
Listen, before we--
Can I ask you a question?
Just 'cause you've been through it.
You think I got what it takes? I mean, to make it in this town?
translation.de: Habe ich das Zeug dazu, es in dieser Stadt zu schaffen?

translation.en: Who can say?
But what I do know, Jack,
is you have a strong light inside you.
translation.de: ...du trägst ein helles Licht in dir.

translation.en: Shine that light on me.
Make me feel like I matter.
translation.de: Gib mir das Gefühl, wichtig zu sein.

translation.en: Even if it's a lie.
-Okay. -[chuckles]
Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.de: Sammy, gute Arbeit. Ricky Boy, das ist für dich.

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, -Rough Ronny. -[Ronny] Thank you.
Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
translation.de: Hey, Champ! Ich hörte, es lief toll!

translation.en: And here's this for your trouble.
translation.de: Und das hier ist für deine Mühe.

translation.en: Not too bad, right?
Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten-year regular of yours truly.
translation.de: Avis ist eine echte Granate, oder? Zehn Jahre Stammkundin.

translation.en: No, it was, uh...
She was kind.
It was actually all right.
Good. In that case, I got another one for you.
translation.de: Gut! Ich hab da was für dich.

translation.en: Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
-Right now? -Right now!
All yours, Kemosabe.
Well, hello there.
Ernie, there's been a mistake.
[stammers] There's some guy in there. That's not just "some guy."
translation.de: -Da ist ein Typ. Irgendein Typ. -Das ist nicht irgendein Typ.

translation.en: That's Cole Porter. He's a living legend.
translation.de: Das ist Cole Porter. Eine lebende Legende.

translation.en: The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes... Yesterday I heard you humming "Don't Fence Me In."
translation.de: "The Gay Divorcee", "Anything goes..." Gestern summtest du "Don't Fence Me In".

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it! So?
So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.de: Schenk ihm zwei Minuten. Er ist sehr höflich.

translation.en: -Don't keep him waiting! -Are you...
Are you telling me you expect me to...
Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
translation.de: Vergessen Sie's, das mach ich nicht!

translation.en: I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me!
I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.de: Hier ist meine Grenze. Ich mach's nicht.

translation.en: -End of story. -Okay.
I see how it goes. You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.de: Ich sehe schon. Du bestimmst nicht über deine Arbeitsbedingungen, sondern ich!

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.de: Ich hab kaum Jungs und werde den Husten nicht los.

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.de: Ich rekrutiere nicht mehr in verrauchten Bars!

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand
translation.de: Wenn du dem Nationalhelden Cole Porter nicht mal einen Dienst erweisen kannst,

translation.en: to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.de: Wenn du dem Nationalhelden Cole Porter nicht mal einen Dienst erweisen kannst, hol mir einen, der's kann.

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
and you can get the fuck out of here!
That suits me fine.
I quit.
Yeah, well, good luck then, kid!
I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
translation.de: Ich wollte auch mal Filmstar werden.

translation.en: Sweetheart.
What are you doing here?
Doctor's appointment?
Jeez, yeah. Um...
Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
[man] You two own your own home?
[Henrietta] No, we're just renting at the moment.
translation.de: GEBURTSHILFE -Nein, wir mieten. -Die Cervix fühlt sich gut an.

translation.en: Cervix feels just right.
translation.de: -Nein, wir mieten. -Die Cervix fühlt sich gut an.

translation.en: Well, it's probably just as well,
because you know what they say,
having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.de: Ein Kind zu haben, ist genauso teuer wie eine Hypothek.

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob wir einen Herzschlag hören.

translation.en: Now, just relax.
Starting on the nursery yet? No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.de: -Ist das Kinderzimmer schon in Arbeit? -Nein, wir haben keinen Platz dafür.

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.de: Sie bekommen also ein Baby und suchen eine neue Wohnung?

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
[doctor] They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
translation.de: Die Babynahrung wurde auch teurer, denken Sie dran.

translation.en: Uh-oh.
What?
Twins.
-[Henrietta] What? -What?
-Yep. Two heartbeats. -You gotta be kidding me.
-[loud thud] -Jack!
-Hiya, Jack. -Flo.
[chuckles] How's Hollywood treating you? Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
-Mm-hm. -Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.de: Mir fehlt Geld, aber ich brauche ein Kostüm.

translation.en: What kind of costume?
-One, please. -[man] Um...
Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
translation.de: Sie müssen nicht zahlen, Officer. Gehen Sie rein.

translation.en: Damn right, I don't have to pay.
How are you today?
I'm fine, how are you?
-I'm well. -Yeah?
You got any money, honey?
Sure do.
I bet you do.
Get out of here.
Shit!
You're coming with me.
Shit.
Walk.
-Are you going to put me in jail? -Shut up. Keep walking.
-Got a squad car somewhere, or-- -I said can it!
-We're going right around the corner. -Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.de: -Wir gehen um die Ecke. -Schwab's ist um die Ecke.

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
What?
Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here?
Am I getting arrested?
Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast or I'm taking you downtown to the lock-up.
translation.de: Hör zu, du packst jetzt aus, sonst lass ich dich Downtown verhaften.

translation.en: Hey, Jack, it's ready.
Let's go.
Hey, Jack, what's with the get-up?
Nothing. It's just my uniform.
I wear it when I'm on duty.
I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.de: Für mich einen Kaffee. Für meinen Freund einen Shirley Temple.

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
Explain yourself.
-What do you want me to say? -Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.de: -Was soll ich sagen? -Fang doch einfach von vorne an.

translation.en: Okay.
I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
translation.de: Ich kam nach LA nach dem Kriegsdienst.

translation.en: I wanted to be a writer.
Still do.
I wrote a script, you know?
Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.de: Sie sprang vom Hollywood Sign, weil die Stadt sie nicht akzeptierte.

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.de: Ich kenne das Gefühl, also schrieb ich darüber.

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
But a hundred bucks... ain't much,
and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.de: Und kein Studio nimmt einen Schwarzen unter Vertrag.

translation.en: I got...
Can I smoke?
Yeah, go ahead.
Thank you.
You need money?
I get a dollar a script down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.de: Ich bekomme einen Dollar pro Skript im Lincoln Theatre für Varieté-Sketche.

translation.en: But that's once a week, so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.de: Aber nur einmal die Woche, also muss ich anschaffen gehen.

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.de: Und das geht weder am Pershing Square noch am Farmer's Market.

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.de: Ich würde wegen Herumlungern verhaftet, also mach ich's bei Joe.

translation.en: Beats washing dishes,
and I like doing it.
Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.de: Warum nicht für etwas Geld nehmen, das nett ist und man sowieso tut?

translation.en: I'm discerning.
-My tricks gotta be good-looking, clean-- -So, you're a gigolo.
translation.de: -Sie müssen gut aussehen, clean sein... -Du bist also ein Gigolo.

translation.en: I'm a writer.
Call it whatever you want.
translation.de: Nennen Sie es, wie Sie wollen.

translation.en: I ain't ashamed.
I know who I am.
Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
translation.de: Was sagst du zu einem Jobangebot?

translation.en: A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
translation.de: Dasselbe wie dein jetziger Job, aber sicherer.

translation.en: What the hell kind of cop are you? I know a fella who owns a gas station.
translation.de: -Was für ein Bulle sind Sie? -Ich kenne einen Tankstellenbesitzer.

translation.en: You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.de: Man zapft Benzin. Und manche wollen mehr, wenn du verstehst.

translation.en: Pay is good, very good. More than what you're charging.
translation.de: Die Bezahlung ist sehr gut. Besser als dein Preis.

translation.en: And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
translation.de: Du kannst es auch nur Typen machen.

translation.en: You ain't no real cop.
Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
translation.de: Außerdem muss ich dich was fragen. Ich muss wissen...

translation.en: Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
translation.de: Machst du's zur Not auch mit Frauen?

translation.en: Yeah.
Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.de: Ich kann's vortäuschen. Wie die meisten Typen bei ihren Frauen.

translation.en: -He's paying for it. -Okay.
I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie. First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
translation.de: Ich stelle dich meinem Freund Ernie vor. Und du hast recht. Ich bin kein Bulle.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
But, until that moment just then,
you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop...
translation.de: Du würdest mich doch als Polizisten besetzen?

translation.en: right?
Sweet beans in a basket.
He'll do the guy stuff? Ask him.
If the price is right.
-50-50. -[scoffs] I'm worth more than that, 60-40.
I like this kid. Enterprising.
Okay, deal.
-Archie Coleman. -You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
I can tell just by looking at you.
What's the password again?
[Ernie] He's all yours, go get him.
translation.de: Er gehört dir. Hol ihn dir.

translation.en: I knew you'd be back.
They always come back.
How's it going?
Can I help you?
Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
The street?
Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
[scoffs] You mean Dreamland?
Yeah. Dreamland.
Okay.
What can I do for you?
translation.de: Was kann ich für dich tun?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
You're not interested in a black man?
No, I'm just a little nervous.
What's your name?
This your place?
Yeah.
I'm renting month-to-month.
I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.de: Sehr bescheiden, aber mehr kann ich mir nicht leisten.

translation.en: What do you want?
-What do you mean? -I mean what do you want to do...
to me?
Or what do you want me to do to you?
translation.de: Oder soll ich was mit dir anstellen?

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, you're, uh...
I like how straightforward you are.
[chuckles] Yeah.
Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.de: Nun, Ihre Investition soll sich lohnen, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Where are you from?
Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
translation.de: Fitzgerald ist mein Stiefvater. Scherer heiße ich wirklich.

translation.en: I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
it didn't really wash.
translation.de: Aber es lief nicht so gut.

translation.en: What about you? Where are you from?
Where am I from?
So, what's a good-looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.de: Und wieso bezahlt ein hübscher Kerl wie du für Zuneigung?

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street?
translation.de: Warum gehst du nicht in die Main-Street-Läden?

translation.en: Harold to the 1-2-3... Cookie, you're making me nervous. [chuckles]
translation.de: Vom Harold's zum 1-2-3... Süßer, du machst mich nervös.

translation.en: Relax.
I'll take good care of you.
translation.de: Ich kümmere mich gut um dich.

translation.en: Uh, I went down there once, but...
I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
translation.de: Ich sah jemanden, den ich zu kennen glaubte.

translation.en: A casting director.
So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.de: Also tat ich so, als wäre ich falsch und ging wieder.

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm...
that way.
[Archie] I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera.
translation.de: Zum Glück will ich nicht vor die Kamera.

translation.en: That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.de: Das würde bei einem wie mir nie funktionieren.

translation.en: -That's why I'm a writer. -A writer? You don't say.
Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.de: Ein Studio prüft gerade mein Drehbuch.

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.de: Vielleicht wird's was Neues. Großes Studio, schwarzer Drehbuchautor.

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.de: Es gab erst zwei oder drei schwarze Drehbuchautoren.

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.de: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes... Aber da ging's um Schwarze.

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.de: In einigen Gegenden des Landes kann man diese Filme nicht zeigen.

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.de: Aber mein Drehbuch handelt von einem weißen Mädchen.

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
translation.de: Wer weiß? Vielleicht könntest du mitspielen.

translation.en: Could you imagine something like that?
translation.de: Kannst du dir so etwas vorstellen?

translation.en: -That would be-- -A dream.
Yeah.
Yeah.
In Dreamland.
And if it comes true?
When it comes...
true.
We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was
translation.de: Dann blicken wir zurück auf unser Kennenlernen,

translation.en: that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
There you go, Jack.
Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.de: Buffalo Billy, Schlüpfriger Sammy, Rabiater Ronny...

translation.en: Goody Two-Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.de: Gesitteter Glen und Arch... Willkommen in der Familie.

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right? [clears throat] It's nothing. It's nothing.
translation.de: -Ernie, was ist los? Alles ok? -Ach, nichts.

translation.en: This black walnut blooms this time of year.
Let's make it another great week, fellas! -[workers] Yes, sir! -Go get 'em. All right.
translation.de: Auf eine weitere tolle Woche, Jungs! Schnappt sie euch. Los!

translation.en: -What'll it be? -Dreamland.
-Where to? -Dreamland.
-Where to for you? -Dreamland.
Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
So is this what you do, full time?
No, uh, just to make ends meet.
translation.de: Nur, um über die Runden zu kommen.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
Really?
I'm in casting.
[Jack] Excuse me, sorry.
Pardon me.
Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.de: Jack! Lang nicht gesehen. Ich dachte, du hast das Handtuch geworfen.

translation.en: -No, still pounding the pavement. -Sure, sure. That's great.
Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.de: Ich? Ich arbeite an einem Sidney-Lanfield-Film.

translation.en: -Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? -Sure.
I walk right next to the camera, real close,
translation.de: Ich laufe neben der Kamera, ganz nah.

translation.en: and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.de: Der Regisseur fügt so Szenen zusammen.

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
translation.de: Er schneidet es quasi. Da kommt sie!

translation.en: Okay.
-I need three warm bodies. -[crowd clamoring]
You, you and... you.
That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
translation.de: Das war's. Wir sehen uns morgen.

translation.en: Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
translation.de: Möchtest du was essen? Ich zahle.

translation.en: [Jack] No, I think I'm gonna stick around. What are you talking about?
Get in here.
What the hell's going on?
Oh, I, uh, I got a walk-on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture. Might get a line!
translation.de: Ich bin Statist im Cecil-B.-DeMille-Film. Vielleicht mit Text.

translation.en: Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.de: Eines Tages kommst du groß raus, Lou. Ich weiß es!

translation.en: How are you?
[exhales] I love this town.
Hello, sweetheart.
What are you doing?
Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
translation.de: Nichts, ich koche bloß für meine Frau.

translation.en: Hungry?
No, suspicious.
What did you do?
Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
translation.de: Nichts, komm einfach her. Setz dich.

translation.en: We're celebrating.
Celebrating what?
You quitting your job.
-What? I like working at Schwab's! -I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.de: -Was? Ich arbeite gern bei Schwab's! -Du musst dich ausruhen.

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.de: Du bist im 3. Monat. Du sollst nicht mehr arbeiten, ok?

translation.en: Not another word about it.
Let's eat.
Just eat!
my...
-God. -That's $500.
How-- How did you get this?
I've been doing good work at the gas station. Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
translation.de: Vom Tankstellenjob. Die Miete ist bezahlt, Gas und Strom auch.

translation.en: Now, that ain't for spending, all right?
translation.de: Aber gib das nicht aus, ok?

translation.en: That's a down-payment... on a house.
translation.de: Das ist eine Anzahlung für ein Haus.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
I thought that's what you wanted. [laughing] It is, I just can't believe it!
translation.de: -Ich dachte, das wolltest du. -Ja, aber ich kann es nicht glauben!

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Thank you! Thank you.
Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.de: Ich tue alles für dich. Und meine Familie.

translation.en: What does that mean, "sexually ambidextrous"?
That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.de: Das heißt, mein Kumpel Stan hier mag Kater und Kätzchen.

translation.en: Huh, no fooling?
Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
-[bell dings] -Thanks.
All yours, Jack.
-Fill 'er up? -Dreamland.
-Hello. -How are you?
-Better now, thank you. -Glad to hear it.
Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.de: Nein, ich nehme kein Geld. Sie zahlen Ernie, und Ernie mich.

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
translation.de: Lieber später, wenn Sie zufrieden sind.

translation.en: Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
translation.de: Sorgt das nicht für meine Zufriedenheit?

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
-You're under arrest. -What?
Got him!
Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
translation.de: Moment, was ist los? Was soll das?

translation.en: -Wait a minute, wait! -[officer] Shut up!
You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
translation.de: Sie sind verhaftet wegen Anwerbung und Unzucht

translation.en: pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647-B.
